unit: Unit 4 | Probability, Random Variables, and Probability Distributions
title: Bank Loans
question_text: A large corporation hopes to get a loan to build an addition to its current corporate headquarters. From experience, the president of the company has determined an $8\%$ chance of getting approved for the loan from any given bank, so she sends out applications to $10$ different banks. Assuming each bank considers the loan independently, what is the probability that at least one of the $10\text{ banks}$ selected grants the loan?
